019package org.jgrapes.io.util;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.io.InterruptedIOException;
023import java.io.Reader;
024import java.nio.Buffer;
025import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
026import java.nio.CharBuffer;
027import java.nio.charset.Charset;
028import java.nio.charset.CharsetDecoder;
029import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
030import java.util.Objects;
031
032/**
033 * A {@link Reader} that provides the data from the {@link ManagedBuffer}s
034 * fed to it to a consumer. This class is intended to be used as a pipe 
035 * between two threads.  
036 */
037public class ManagedBufferReader extends Reader {
038
039    private boolean isEndOfFeed;
040    private boolean isOpen = true;
041    private ManagedBuffer<? extends Buffer> current;
042    private CharsetDecoder decoder;
043    private CharBuffer decoded;
044    private Charset charset = StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
045
046    /**
047     * Sets the charset to be used if {@link #feed(ManagedBuffer)}
048     * is invoked with `ManagedBuffer<Charset>`. Defaults to UTF-8. 
049     * Must be set before the first invocation of 
050     * {@link #feed(ManagedBuffer)}.  
051     *
052     * @param charset the charset
053     * @return the managed buffer reader
054     */
055    public ManagedBufferReader setCharset(Charset charset) {
056        if (decoder != null) {
057            throw new IllegalStateException("Charset cannot be changed.");
058        }
059        this.charset = charset;
060        return this;
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * Feed data to the reader. The call blocks while data from a previous
065     * invocation has not been fully read. The buffer passed as argument
066     * is locked (see {@link ManagedBuffer#lockBuffer()}) until all
067     * data has been read.
068     * 
069     * Calling this method with `null` as argument closes the feed.
070     * After consuming any data still available from a previous
071     * invocation, further calls to {@link #read} therefore return -1.
072     *
073     * @param buffer the buffer
074     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
075     */
076    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.PreserveStackTrace" })
077    public <W extends Buffer> void feed(ManagedBuffer<W> buffer)
078            throws IOException {
079        synchronized (lock) {
080            if (buffer == null) {
081                isEndOfFeed = true;
082                notifyAll();
083                return;
084            }
085            if (!isOpen || isEndOfFeed) {
086                return;
087            }
088            while (current != null) {
089                try {
090                    lock.wait();
091                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
092                    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
093                    var exc = new InterruptedIOException(e.getMessage());
094                    exc.setStackTrace(e.getStackTrace());
095                    throw exc;
096                }
097            }
098            current = buffer;
099            buffer.lockBuffer();
100            lock.notifyAll();
101        }
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * {@inheritDoc}
106     * 
107     * Note that this is the {@link Reader}'s `close` method. In order
108     * to close the feed, call {@link #feed(ManagedBuffer)} with
109     * `null` as argument.
110     */
111    @Override
112    public void close() throws IOException {
113        synchronized (lock) {
114            isOpen = false;
115            if (current != null) {
116                current.unlockBuffer();
117                current = null;
118            }
119            lock.notifyAll();
120        }
121    }
122
123    @Override
124    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.PreserveStackTrace", "unchecked",
125        "PMD.CognitiveComplexity", "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
126        "PMD.NcssCount" })
127    public int read(char[] cbuf, int off, int len) throws IOException {
128        Objects.checkFromIndexSize(off, len, cbuf.length);
129        synchronized (lock) {
130            while (isOpen && current == null && !isEndOfFeed) {
131                try {
132                    lock.wait();
133                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
134                    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
135                    var exc = new InterruptedIOException(e.getMessage());
136                    exc.setStackTrace(e.getStackTrace());
137                    throw exc;
138                }
139            }
140            if (!isOpen || isEndOfFeed && current == null) {
141                return -1;
142            }
143            CharBuffer input;
144            if (current.backingBuffer() instanceof CharBuffer) {
145                input = ((ManagedBuffer<CharBuffer>) current).backingBuffer();
146            } else {
147                if (decoder == null) {
148                    decoder = charset.newDecoder();
149                    decoded = CharBuffer.allocate(current.capacity());
150                }
151                var result = decoder.decode(
152                    ((ManagedBuffer<ByteBuffer>) current).backingBuffer(),
153                    decoded, isEndOfFeed);
154                assert !result.isOverflow();
155                decoded.flip();
156                input = decoded;
157            }
158            int transferred;
159            if (input.remaining() <= len) {
160                // Get all remaining.
161                transferred = input.remaining();
162                input.get(cbuf, off, transferred);
163                if (decoded != null) {
164                    decoded.clear();
165                }
166                current.unlockBuffer();
167                current = null;
168                lock.notifyAll();
169            } else {
170                // Get requested.
171                transferred = len;
172                input.get(cbuf, off, transferred);
173            }
174            return transferred;
175        }
176    }
177
178}
